original_title: Heart: Fanatic - Live from Caesars Colosseum
overview: Ann and Nancy Wilson, better known as Heart, celebrate the release of their 14th studio album “Fanatic” with a performance from Caesars Colosseum in Winsor, Ontario. Performing new songs and hits like “Alone”, “Crazy on You” and “Barracuda” this concert is NOT to be missed.
title: Heart: Fanatic - Live from Caesars Colosseum
